overview_of_class: This course is designed to provide relevant leadership principles and practices for effective team leadership.  Course participants will study the work of theorists and practitioners to gain essential and relevant background knowledge and learn skills and strategies to lead teams to function in a student-centered, positive, collaborative, organized and goal-oriented manner.  Elements of both the Art and the Science of Team Leadership will be incorporated into this course.
name: Leading Teacher Teams
subject: MS_ED
